name: The Alpha 001
description:
Immerse yourself in the simulation, explore the territory, think deeper, search ... Find the developer, take revenge on him ... The simulation will constantly change, be prepared for these changes. Walk and explore, because a lot of new things are waiting for you, everything will change every time, any bug is planned, so do not pay attention to them. Build, kill, improve relations with the village and the inhabitants, improve yourself, trade ... And seek, seek, seek. Remember to think deeper, this is important. Alone or with friends, conquer new heights, fight for the right to life with evil orcs, and in the future with various monsters! In this simulation, you will have to build a lot, collect resources: chop down trees, mine ore and stones, collect leaves and sticks from bushes. Hunting is just as important here as fishing, because you can't do anything on an empty stomach!

Features:
● Multiplayer! Play alone or with friends in multiplayer co-op.
● Chest! Use chests in order not to lose your resources after death.
● Repair! Repair body parts, weapons and tools.
● Build! Transform your small village into a huge city.
● Research! Explore the entire virtual world with a flying drone.
● Navigation! Travel to new locations using a map or virtual pins.
● Shop! Sell ​​and buy resources to boost the village's economy.
● Fight! Defend your village from evil orcs.
● Collect! Chop trees, mine ore, collect sticks and leaves from bushes.
● Horse! Use your faithful companion to get to faraway places with a breeze.
● The plot! The deep plot will make you think deeply.
● Additional quests! Help your population by completing tasks that you can take from the residents.
